summary: Simply, small quest. You help the woman called Aeon.
descriptionHtml:
This is a little quest. (The first one I dare to publish, I learned much.) You help Aeon to get back her amulet. Aeon\'s house is near Riverwood just next to the road.

Aeon is marriagable after completing quest.

Version 1.1 - Fixes
*Added quest reward
*Fixed house tilt
*Aeon\'s house door unlocked
*If you find dungeon first without quest you can\'t loot amulet

If there\'s something what need to improved please post comment. I tried to fix and improve mod and learn more about CK.

Also on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80145617
author: Royalhowl

files.name: Aeons Request - Bug fix and Update
